answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Tracy – I hope the following is helpful:
Alameda - The development program set forth in the Preliminary Development Concept (PDC) is required to meet two key financial thresholds… http://www.alameda-point.com/resources/pdf/appendixe.pdf 
Walnut Creek – Council Report re: ADOPTION OF FISCAL NEUTRALITY POLICY RELATED TO MULTIFAMILY RESIDENTIAL PROJECTS - http://walnutcreek.granicus.com/MetaViewer.php?meta_id=74851&view=&showpdf=1 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

author: Tracy Miller
text:
Sarasota County government is seeking to information from other local governments to determine if you have examples of development approval requirements that require a demonstration of “Fiscal Neutrality” or no net negative fiscal impact or a project.  We greatly appreciate your help with this question.  Please respond to:  Allen Parsons (aparsons@scgov.net) by Friday, July 12th, 2013, if possible.    
Best Regards,  
Tracy Miller  
Senior Strategist  
Sarasota County, FL  
tmiller@scgov.net
title: Fiscal Neutrality
